mapper.insert: insert into auth_resource (id, parent_id, name, code, type, status, router, memo, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, sort, icon, path_tree ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{router,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathTree,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update auth_resource set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, router = #{router,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path_tree = #{pathTree,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, name, code, type, status, router, memo, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, sort, icon, path_tree from auth_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
